mapper.insert: INSERT INTO staff_users (email, password, full_name, phone, role, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{fullName}, #{phone}, #{role}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM staff_users WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM staff_users WHERE phone = #{phone}
SELECT user_id AS userId, email, password, full_name AS fullName, phone, role, status FROM staff_users WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT user_id AS userId, email, password, full_name AS fullName, phone, role, status FROM staff_users WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE staff_users SET full_name = #{fullName}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, role = #{role}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
